惼字的基本解释

惼
biǎn
心胸狭窄：“方舟而济于河，有虚船来触舟，虽有惼心之人，不怒。”

惼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［biǎn］
［《廣韻》方典切，上銑，幫。］
［《集韻》補典切，上銑，幫。］
狭隘；急躁。参见“惼心”、“惼懆”。

惼字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　惼； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页393第08
【廣韻】方典切【集韻】【正韻】補典切【韻會】俾緬切，?音扁。【爾雅·釋言】急也。【集韻】愝惼，性狹也。【莊子·山木篇】有虛船來觸舟，雖有惼心之人不怒。　又通作褊。【詩·魏風】維是褊心。

惼字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
惼字的起名意思

暂无。

Anxious
Basic explanation of words
Anxious
biǎn
Narrow-minded: "The ark is on the river, and there is a virtual boat to touch the boat. Although there are people who are worried, they are not angry."
Anxious
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［biǎn］
["Guang Yun" Fang Dian cut, milled, help. ]
["Jiyun" supplementary cut, milling, help. ]
Narrow-minded; impatient. See "Xianxin", "Xianmei".
Anxious
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　惼; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 393 08
[Guang Yun] Fang Dianqie [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Complementary Dianqie [Rhyme] Bi-Burman cut,? Yin Bian. 【Erya·Interpretation】Anxious. 【Jiyun】Fun and narrow in nature. [Zhuangzi·Mountain and Mu] There is a virtual boat to touch the boat, although there are people who are not angry.　It's a good idea again. [Poetry·Wei Feng] Wei is the heart.
